research_info1: Welcome! We collect data for dialogue system research, i.e. we want to create a chatbot (computer program which talks with human) with specific properties.
research_info2: This survey consist of simulated life situation. You will choose your profile and make some decisions. In the end you will talk with chatbot. Participating in the survey agree to use all collected data for scientific purposes.
choose_profile_text: Choose one of following profiles. This profile creates your background information for the whole simulation. Feel free to choose the most suitable for you.
thank_you_text: Thank you for your participation. It would be great if you share this web with your friends. You are welcome to repeat the game once again, but please choose another profile.
